title: Mountain View Resort Website Redesign
shortDescription: Complete website redesign with booking functionality for a luxury mountain resort.
fullDescription: Mountain View Resort needed a complete website overhaul to showcase their luxury accommodations and streamline their booking process. We designed and developed a responsive website with stunning visuals, intuitive navigation, and a seamless booking system. The result was a 45% increase in online bookings and a 30% decrease in booking abandonment rate.
results: 3.5 minute average session duration (up from 1.2 minutes)

title: GreenTech Solutions SEO Campaign
shortDescription: Comprehensive SEO strategy for a renewable energy technology company.
fullDescription: GreenTech Solutions was struggling to rank for competitive keywords in the renewable energy sector. We implemented a comprehensive SEO strategy including technical SEO fixes, content optimization, and link building. Within six months, they ranked on page one for 75% of their target keywords, resulting in a 120% increase in organic traffic and 85% more leads from organic search.
results: 85% increase in leads from organic search
First page rankings for 75% of target keywords

title: Urban Eats PPC Campaign
shortDescription: Targeted PPC campaign for a restaurant group to increase online orders.
fullDescription: Urban Eats Restaurant Group wanted to increase their online food orders across their chain of restaurants. We created a targeted Google Ads campaign focusing on local keywords, mobile users, and peak ordering times. The campaign achieved a 320% ROI with a 15% conversion rate, resulting in a significant increase in online orders and new customers.
results: 28% of orders came from new customers

title: FitLife Social Media Campaign
shortDescription: Engaging social media strategy for a fitness center to increase memberships.
fullDescription: FitLife Gym needed to increase their membership sign-ups and engage with their existing members. We developed a comprehensive social media strategy across Instagram, Facebook, and TikTok, featuring workout videos, success stories, and promotional offers. The campaign resulted in a 75% increase in engagement, 12,000 new followers, and a 35% increase in membership inquiries.
results: 28% of new members cited social media as their discovery source

title: Bright Smile Dental Website
shortDescription: Modern, patient-friendly website for a dental practice with online appointment booking.
fullDescription: Bright Smile Dental needed a website that would showcase their services, educate patients, and allow for easy appointment booking. We designed a modern, user-friendly website with detailed service pages, patient testimonials, and an integrated appointment booking system. The new website resulted in a 60% increase in appointment requests and improved patient satisfaction.
results: 50% reduction in appointment scheduling phone calls

title: TechPro E-commerce SEO
shortDescription: E-commerce SEO strategy for an electronics retailer to increase product visibility and sales.
fullDescription: TechPro Electronics was struggling with low organic visibility for their product pages. We implemented a comprehensive e-commerce SEO strategy focusing on product page optimization, schema markup, and category page enhancements. The campaign resulted in a 95% increase in organic traffic, 70% more product page visibility, and a 55% increase in organic sales.
results: 55% increase in sales from organic search
42% improvement in average position for target keywords

title: Luxury Homes Real Estate PPC
shortDescription: Targeted PPC campaign for a luxury real estate agency to generate high-quality leads.
fullDescription: Luxury Homes Real Estate wanted to generate high-quality leads for their premium properties. We created a sophisticated PPC campaign targeting high-net-worth individuals with specific interests and behaviors. The campaign achieved a 450% ROI with a 12% lead conversion rate, resulting in multiple high-value property sales.
results: 5 direct sales attributed to the campaign

title: Organic Harvest Social Media
shortDescription: Engaging social media content strategy for an organic food brand to increase brand awareness and sales.
fullDescription: Organic Harvest Foods wanted to increase brand awareness and drive sales for their range of organic products. We developed a content-rich social media strategy featuring recipe videos, farm-to-table stories, and educational content about organic farming. The campaign resulted in a 110% increase in engagement, 25,000 new followers, and a 45% increase in website traffic from social channels.
results: 45% increase in website traffic from social channels
38% increase in online sales attributed to social media
